name: Dancing Demon
description:
Version for the ZX81 of the Dancing Demon program that was very successful on the TRS80 microcomputers.

Choreograph the dance and compose the music for the dancing demon to put on his show. The program already comes with two pre-programmed shows.

You need a sound generator compatible with the ZON-X81 to play the songs.

More information about the original program, including the program manual download, at the following link:

http://www.dnull.com/demon/
